Package boundary

Class AvailabilitySetterBoundary

java.lang.Object
boundary.Boundary
boundary.AvailabilitySetterBoundary
public class AvailabilitySetterBoundary extends Boundary
AvailabilitySetter Boundary class represents the user interface for a doctor setting their availability.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Doctor
    doctor
    The doctor for whom appointment availability is being managed.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    displayAvailabilitySummary(List<Appointment> availableAppointments)
    Displays a summary of the available appointments set by the doctor, showing details such as date, time, location, and record IDs.
    protected void
    printChoice()
    Prints the menu options for the Appointment Availability UI.
    void
    setAvailabilityForAppointments()
    Allows the doctor to set available appointment time slots by entering details such as location and appointment date and time.
    void
    start()
    Starts the appointment availability UI, allowing the doctor to set available time slots or return to the Doctor Dashboard.

      public void start()

      start in class Boundary

    • setAvailabilityForAppointments

      public void setAvailabilityForAppointments()
      Allows the doctor to set available appointment time slots by entering details such as location and appointment date and time. Appointments are saved and a summary of availability is displayed.

    • displayAvailabilitySummary

      private void displayAvailabilitySummary(List<Appointment> availableAppointments)
      Displays a summary of the available appointments set by the doctor, showing details such as date, time, location, and record IDs.
      Parameters:
      availableAppointments - the list of available appointments
